con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://example.com/player-service" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/player-service"> <!--Type definitions--> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/player-service"> <!--Common Types--> <xsd:complexType name="ErrorType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Player Statistics Type--> <xsd:complexType name="StatisticsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="season" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="goals" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="assists" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="matches" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="yellowCards" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="redCards" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="minutesPlayed" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Award Type--> <xsd:complexType name="AwardType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="awardName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="year" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="category" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Player Type--> <xsd:complexType name="PlayerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="club" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="position" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="age" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="isActive" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="statistics" type="tns:StatisticsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="awards" type="tns:AwardType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Fault Types--> <xsd:element name="ValidationFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="error" type="tns:ErrorType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NotFoundFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="error" type="tns:ErrorType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConflictFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="error" type="tns:ErrorType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AuthenticationFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="error" type="tns:ErrorType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <!--Request and Response Types--> <xsd:element name="getPlayerRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getPlayerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="player" type="tns:PlayerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createPlayerRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="club" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="position" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="age" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="isActive" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="statistics" type="tns:StatisticsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="awards" type="tns:AwardType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createPlayerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="player" type="tns:PlayerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updatePlayerRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="club" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="position" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="age" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="isActive" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="statistics" type="tns:StatisticsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="awards" type="tns:AwardType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updatePlayerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="player" type="tns:PlayerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="deletePlayerRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="deletePlayerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="playerId" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listPlayersRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listPlayersResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="players" type="tns:PlayerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="bulkCreatePlayersRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="players" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="club" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="position" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="age" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="isActive" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="statistics" type="tns:StatisticsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="awards" type="tns:AwardType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="bulkCreatePlayersResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="players" type="tns:PlayerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <!--Token Generation Types--> <xsd:element name="generateTokenRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="password" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="generateTokenResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="token" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="expiresIn" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--Message definitions--> <wsdl:message name="getPlayerInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:getPlayerRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getPlayerOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:getPlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ValidationError"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ValidationFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="NotFoundError"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:NotFoundFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ConflictError"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ConflictFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AuthenticationError"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:AuthenticationFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createPlayerInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:createPlayerRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createPlayerOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:createPlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updatePlayerInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:updatePlayerRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updatePlayerOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:updatePlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deletePlayerInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:deletePlayerRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deletePlayerOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:deletePlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listPlayersInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:listPlayersRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listPlayersOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:listPlayersResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--Add messages for bulk create--> <wsdl:message name="bulkCreatePlayersInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:bulkCreatePlayersRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="bulkCreatePlayersOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:bulkCreatePlayersResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--Add after bulkCreatePlayers messages--> <wsdl:message name="generateTokenInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:generateTokenRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="generateTokenOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:generateTokenResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--Port Type--> <wsdl:portType name="PlayerPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="generateToken"> <wsdl:input message="tns:generateTokenRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:generateTokenResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createPlayer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createPlayerRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:createPlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getPlayer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getPlayerRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getPlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listPlayers"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listPlayersRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:listPlayersResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updatePlayer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:updatePlayerRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:updatePlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deletePlayer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:deletePlayerRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:deletePlayerResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--SOAP Binding--> <wsdl:binding name="PlayerBinding" type="tns:PlayerPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="generateToken"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/generateToken"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createPlayer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/createPlayer"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getPlayer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/getPlayer"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listPlayers"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/listPlayers"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updatePlayer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/updatePlayer"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deletePlayer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/deletePlayer"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--Service--> <wsdl:service name="PlayerService"> <wsdl:port name="PlayerPort" binding="tns:PlayerBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:3000/soap/player"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://example.com/player-service" name="PlayerService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/player-service"> <!--Type definitions--> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/player-service"> <!--Common Types--> <xsd:complexType name="ErrorType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Player Statistics Type--> <xsd:complexType name="StatisticsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="season" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="goals" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="assists" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="matches" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="yellowCards" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="redCards" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="minutesPlayed" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Award Type--> <xsd:complexType name="AwardType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="awardName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="year" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="category" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Player Type--> <xsd:complexType name="PlayerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="club" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="position" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="age" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="isActive" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="statistics" type="tns:StatisticsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="awards" type="tns:AwardType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Request and Response Elements--> <xsd:element name="generateTokenRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="password" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="generateTokenResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="token" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="expiresIn" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createPlayerRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="player" type="tns:PlayerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createPlayerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="player" type="tns:PlayerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getPlayerRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getPlayerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="player" type="tns:PlayerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listPlayersRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listPlayersResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="statusCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="players" type="tns:PlayerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--Message definitions--> <wsdl:message name="generateTokenInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:generateTokenRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="generateTokenOutput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:generateTokenResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createPlayerInput"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:createPlayerRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message <wsdl:input message="tns:listPlayersInput"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:listPlayersOutput"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--SOAP Binding--> <wsdl:binding name="PlayerServiceSOAPBinding" type="tns:PlayerPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="generateToken"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/generateToken"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getPlayer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/getPlayer"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listPlayers"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/player-service/listPlayers"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--Service--> <wsdl:service name="PlayerService"> <wsdl:port name="PlayerServiceSOAP" binding="tns:PlayerServiceSOAPBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:3000/soap/player"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:play="http://example.com/player-service"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <play:createPlayerRequest> <player> <!--Optional:--> <id>?</id> <name>?</name> <country>?</country> <club>?</club> <position>?</position> <age>?</age> <isActive>?</isActive> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <statistics> <season>?</season> <goals>?</goals> <assists>?</assists> <matches>?</matches> <!--Optional:--> <yellowCards>?</yellowCards> <!--Optional:--> <redCards>?</redCards> <!--Optional:--> <minutesPlayed>?</minutesPlayed> </statistics> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <awards> <awardName>?</awardName> <year>?</year> <category>?</category> </awards> </player> </play:createPlayerRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
